title: Photo
description: Ana is taking photos at a friend's wedding. She is quickly captivated by a beautiful stranger when she takes her photograph. Why does this woman make Ana feel things that she never has before?This is a hot erotic short story from Best Selling Lesbian Romance Author, Emily Hayes. Professional photographer, Ana, knows she needs to change her life. Can the seductive stranger, Morgan, be the one to take her places she has never been? Morgan makes her feel things she never thought possible. Morgan makes her want things she never thought possible.Emily Hayes is the mistress of light BDSM themes and Erotic Romance.
author: Emily  Hayes
